snippet: Speculation has begun about John C. Liu’s political viability and legal exposure following the convictions of two former associates in an illegal campaign-finance scheme.
abstract: Speculation has begun about New York City Comptroller John C Liu’s political viability and legal exposure following convictions of two former associates in an illegal campaign-finance scheme.

byline.original: By DAVID W. CHEN and BENJAMIN WEISER

lead_paragraph: Speculation has begun about John C. Liu’s political viability and legal exposure following the convictions of two former associates in an illegal campaign-finance scheme.

headline.seo: Questions Linger for Liu After Ex-Associates’ Trial
headline.main: Questions Linger for Liu After Ex-Associates’ Trial
headline.print_headline: Questions Linger for Liu After Ex-Associates’ Trial
